'''''Cantharellus subpruinosus''''' is a species of [[fungus]] in the family [[Cantharellaceae]]. A European species, it was originally described from France in 2000, where it was found growing in moss in mixed [[deciduous]] and [[spruce]] woodland.<ref name="Eyssartier 2000"/>
